front.title: 5G-Core System Split Bearer's FILTER for Dual Access

abstract.t: This document attempts the case for new work that need to be developed for 5G user to improve faster download and upload of user's data via FILTER mechanism to be implemented at UPF user plane data for dual-access outlining the poor radio coverage issue. FILTER template governs the user data split at UPF with maintaining agreed PCC rules to achieve required throughput.
